title: Adam Woodward & Marton Csokas in 'Man with No Past' Action Trailer
description: "With what do you bribe a man who already has everything?" Paramount Movies has revealed an official trailer for Man with No Past, yet another new action thriller from stuntmant filmmaker James Bamford. He's churning these out by the dozen - this year alone he also has the films Hard Home, Jade, and Utopia. And this one coming next. Man with No Past is exactly as the title describes - an amnesiac man awakens in unknown city, seeking truth about past and who he is. Aided by many mysterious allies, he then infiltrates a powerful gang, engaging in a time-transcending battle while fate looms... This epic showdown will seal his fate and reveal his identity. Starring Adam Woodward as Ryder, Marton Csokas, Charlotte Weston, Philip Winchester, Jeff Alexander, and Jon Voight. Wait – in this footage, it seems this guy is some kind of time-hopping assassin who's been around hundreds of years fighting at different times? Huh, okay. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for James Bamford's Man with No Past, direct from YouTube: Academy Award winner Jon Voight, Marton Csokas, and Adam Woodward star in this action-packed thriller. Waking in an unfamiliar city, a man with no memory of […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "With what do you bribe a man who already has everything?" Paramount Movies has revealed an official trailer for Man with No Past, yet another new action thriller from stuntmant filmmaker James Bamford. He's churning these out by the dozen - this year alone he also has the films Hard Home, Jade, and Utopia. And
text: TRAILERS by December 9, 2024Source: YouTube "With what do you bribe a man who already has everything?" Paramount Movies has revealed an official trailer for Man with No Past, yet another new action thriller from stuntmant filmmaker James Bamford. He's churning these out by the dozen - this year alone he also has the films Hard Home, Jade, and Utopia. And this one coming next. Man with No Past is exactly as the title describes - an amnesiac man awakens in unknown city, seeking truth about past and who he is. Aided by many mysterious allies, he then infiltrates a powerful gang, engaging in a time-transcending battle while fate looms... This epic showdown will seal his fate and reveal his identity. Starring Adam Woodward as Ryder, Marton Csokas, Charlotte Weston, Philip Winchester, Jeff Alexander, and Jon Voight. Wait – in this footage, it seems this guy is some kind of time-hopping assassin who's been around hundreds of years fighting at different times? Huh, okay. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for James Bamford's Man with No Past, direct from YouTube: Academy Award winner Jon Voight, Marton Csokas, and Adam Woodward star in this action-packed thriller. Waking in an unfamiliar city, a man with no memory of who he is must confront the mysteries of his own identity. But his desperate search to uncover his past pits him against a powerful enemy, leading to a showdown that will seal his fate and finally reveal his true identity. Man with No Past is directed by Canadian stuntman / filmmaker James Bamford, also a stunt coordinator, and director of the films Jade, Air Force One Down, Shadow Land, Hard Home, and Utopia (from this year) previously, plus the "Arrow" series. The screenplay is written by Steven Paul. It's also produced by Steven Paul. Paramount Movies will debut Man with No Past direct-to-VOD starting on January 14th, 2025 early in the new year. Interested? Find more posts in: To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
December 9, 2024
Source: YouTube

"With what do you bribe a man who already has everything?" Paramount Movies has revealed an official trailer for Man with No Past, yet another new action thriller from stuntmant filmmaker James Bamford. He's churning these out by the dozen - this year alone he also has the films Hard Home, Jade, and Utopia. And this one coming next. Man with No Past is exactly as the title describes - an amnesiac man awakens in unknown city, seeking truth about past and who he is. Aided by many mysterious allies, he then infiltrates a powerful gang, engaging in a time-transcending battle while fate looms... This epic showdown will seal his fate and reveal his identity. Starring Adam Woodward as Ryder, Marton Csokas, Charlotte Weston, Philip Winchester, Jeff Alexander, and Jon Voight. Wait – in this footage, it seems this guy is some kind of time-hopping assassin who's been around hundreds of years fighting at different times? Huh, okay.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for James Bamford's Man with No Past, direct from YouTube:

Academy Award winner Jon Voight, Marton Csokas, and Adam Woodward star in this action-packed thriller. Waking in an unfamiliar city, a man with no memory of who he is must confront the mysteries of his own identity. But his desperate search to uncover his past pits him against a powerful enemy, leading to a showdown that will seal his fate and finally reveal his true identity. Man with No Past is directed by Canadian stuntman / filmmaker James Bamford, also a stunt coordinator, and director of the films Jade, Air Force One Down, Shadow Land, Hard Home, and Utopia (from this year) previously, plus the "Arrow" series. The screenplay is written by Steven Paul. It's also produced by Steven Paul. Paramount Movies will debut Man with No Past direct-to-VOD starting on January 14th, 2025 early in the new year. Interested?

Find more posts in: To Watch, Trailer
